# Background

Hydrometric station for the project area 

```{r}
hydat_stations <- fpr::fpr_db_query(query = fpr_dbq_clip_local('whse_environmental_monitoring.envcan_hydrometric_stn_sp',
'whse_basemapping.fwa_watershed_groups_poly', 'watershed_group_code', c("FRAN", "LCHL","NECR")))
```

```{r, eval= FALSE}
# Use if you want to create a hydrograph for a each station
hydat_stations %>% 
  dplyr::filter(station_operating_status == "ACTIVE-REALTIME") %>% 
  dplyr::filter(!(station_number == '08JB007')) %>% 
  pull(station_number) %>%
  lapply(fpr_create_hydrograph_local)

```


```{r, eval=TRUE}
fpr_create_hydrograph_local("08JB002")
```

```{r pane-hydat-08JB002, fig.cap = "Stellako River At Glenannan (Station #08JB002 - Lat 54.0078 Lon -125.00892). Available daily discharge data from 1929 to 2021."}
knitr::include_graphics("fig/hydrology_stats_08JB002.png")
```
